title: Meal Planner (Group Project)
description: This web application helps the user plan their meals by searching for a recipe and drink, then save that information to a calendar for the week.

title: Work Day Scheduler (My Project)
description: This web application helps the user generate a randomized password to better ensure a safe and secure experience when making an account.

title: Password Generator (My Project)
description: This web application helps the user map out their work by using a dynamic planner to input tasks into hourly slots for the day.

title: Your Neighbor Chef (Group Project)
description: This web application helps users sign up as a Foodie or local Chef to either purchase homemade meals or create dishes to build a menu and sell them to others in your community.

title: Team Profile Generator (My Project)
description: This web application helps the user to build a team of employees, log their information through the terminal, and generate a basic webpage to display it.

title: E-Commerce Backend (My Project)
description: This web application helps the user to manage products, organized by their category, connected tags and product tags.
